element.name: Saw Cleaver
element.description:
A trick weapon devised by the workshop to hunt beasts, this saw-toothed blade is affixed to a handle by a hinge, enabling one to slash with it like an axe or like a halberd.
Trick Weapon.
As a bonus action, you can flick the saw around from under the handle to lengthen its reach, or back again. While extended, the saw cleaver has the reach and two-handed properties. In addition, you have disadvantage on attacks made against targets within 5 feet of you while the saw cleaver is extended.
